name: JACKSON COUNTY KANSAS
sampleDescriptions: Payment for lost revenues and services rendered due to large Native American lands in trust.
Payment for lost revenues and services rendered due to large Native American lands in trust.
To find ways to alleviate the impact of the loss of revenues and cost of services provided to a Native American tribe owning 20+% of county lands.
